The judge at Thursday's hearing also ordered 24 - year - old Austin Jones to stay off the internet and to remain in his mother's suburban Chicago home. Jones was released on bond. Fans know Jones for his coiffed blond hair and cheerful persona. But he sounded somber telling the court he understood his release conditions.
